pullrequest.title: DRC Practice task 7 world and launch files.

content.raw:
I've noticed that if you select each of the panels in gazebo, the collision box is different for the second (starting at the left) panel, which seems just fine and the others are bigger than real area, see Image:

![](http://i41.tinypic.com/2mrg0g2.png)

Not sure about the impact of this.

P.D: sorry this should have gone into gazebo_models.
